text: The Serf Actress () is a 1963 Soviet musical film directed by Roman Tikhomirov.ВЕЛИКАЯ ОТКАЗНИЦАВ рабстве у «Оскара»История киностудии "Ленфильм". Справка == Plot == The film tells about the serf Nastya Batmanova, who was able to make a successful acting career in the court theater. She travels around the world, and when she returns, she finds herself in the Kutaisovo mansion among hussars and ladies, and there in her soul a feeling of love is born.Крепостная актриса == Cast == * Tamara Syomina as Anastasiya Batmanova * Yevgeny Leonov as Count Ivan Pavlovich Kutaysov * Dmitri Smirnov as Prince Andrei Tumansky * Sergey Yurskiy as Prince Nikita Petrovich Baturin * Grenada Mnatsakanova as Polenka * Aleksandr Potapov as Mitka * Sergey Filippov as Ruler of Yelpidifor * Glikeriya Bogdanova-Chesnokova as Primadonna Glikeriya Orestovna Rykalova * Marina Polbentseva as Avdotya LytkinaКрепостная актриса (1963) Full Cast & Crew == References == == External links == * Category:1963 films Category:Russian-language films Category:Soviet musical films Category:Soviet films
title: The Serf Actress
